channel.title: Steel Industry on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Steel Industry on FinanClub

item.title: CLF
item.description: score:-38 Chances: Shares of Cleveland-Cliffs are rising after J.P. Morgan said to buy the stock. Cleveland-Cliffs (CLF) shares have started gaining and might continue moving higher in the near term, as indicated by solid earnings estimate revisions. Risks: There is a potential deal risk associated with United States Steel stock, as analyst Bill Peterson sees too much deal risk.

item.title: X
item.description: score:-22 Chances: U.S. Steel Corp. has the potential for a likely earnings beat in its upcoming report. Nippon Steel Corp. made an aggressive all-cash offer for United States Steel Corp., indicating potential for a high acquisition price. Risks: The acquisition bid from Nippon Steel Corp.
